name: TowerWatcher
description:
Defend your tower and attack other towers to be conqueror of your league!

* Build your tower and design floors
* Play single player or multiplayer game to earn more score and gold
* Get new players and upgrade their abilities in order to conquer enemy towers
* Get high score in your league to earn more gold daily
* Login every day to get more daily gold rewards
* Complete your tasks to earn more gold

How to play:
Start playing single player levels to earn gold.
It is basically about pushing red or brown boxes and try to squeeze monsters. Some of the monsters doesn't follow you, so you are safe unless you touch them. Some monsters will follow you, you need to run away from them, when they are passing through between two boxes, push boxes and squeeze them.

Push Brown Box:
Brown boxes will move 1 step. Those can not squeeze monsters if there is no box or wall at other side of the monsters.

Push Red Boxes:
Red boxes will move at the end of the way. Those will kill all monsters on the way.

If you die in a level, you can continue with your other players, so it will be necessary to buy new players from shop.

There are 4 different players. Each player have 3 common ability, those are; speed, gold bonus and score bonus. You need to upgrade them to be faster, get more gold and score. Speed ability is one of the most important. Because you will need to be faster to finish levels on time and you need to run away from powerful monsters.

When player reached to level 10 you will get new ability. Those are player specific abilities;
Speed: You will have high speed for 5 sec in each level
Invisible: You will be invisible for 5 sec in each level
Power: All boxes will be red, so you will be able to push boxes at the end of the way for 5 sec in each level
Reuse: Even after death, you will be able to continue with same player.

You need more gold in order to get new players or upgrade abilities of existing players.
You can get more golds from multiplayer. But first you need to make a good defense.
For this add new floors to your tower and design them. Higher tower is meaning better defense. It is important that your levels are hard to pass. Otherwise your tower will be conquered by other players and you will lost some of your gold.
In multiplayer attacks you will be matched with random player. You need to pass all floors of your enemy in order to get more gold and score. If you stuck on a level you will get limited gold and score.

Getting more score is also important. You need to get high score in your league to get daily league rewards.
